description:
At Meridian Partners, we rely on our business and technical experience along with sound judgment to deliver the best solutions to our clients. We understand the challenges that our clients face every day to mitigate risk, control costs, implement the right long term solutions for their business, and attain buy-in from end users.
To assure that their ERP solutions meet these challenges, we provide our clients with the most knowledgeable, experienced resources as well as a commitment to long term success. To us, this is the only methodology that makes sense.
Our consultants have years of experience and a deep knowledge of ERP solutions. For upgrades, new module implementations, training, maintenance and support, we use our wide base of expertise to provide the right, most cost effective solution for our clients.
